title: Language Development
alt: The worst is the Terrible Twos, when they're always throwing things and shrieking, "forsooth, to bed thou shalt not take me, cur!"
transcript:
[Megan and Cueball stand to the right of the frame, discussing her baby. The baby has dark hair and sits on the left side of a table in an elevated baby chair.]
Megan: He's only 1, so he still mostly speaks proto-Indo-European.
Megan: But we've heard a few Germanic words already, so Old English can't be far off.
Cueball: They progress so fast!
Baby: *melg-
Baby: *pl(e)hk-
